content: Create comprehensive research flow end-to-end tests covering authentication, WebSocket, API, and UI interactions
Create device-specific test suites for iPhone SE, 15, 15 Pro, iPad Air, Pro, and mini with orientation and multitasking scenarios
Create comprehensive error scenario tests for network interruption, WebSocket disconnection, and timeout handling
Create performance tests for research submission latency, WebSocket connection establishment, and memory usage
Create iPad-specific test suites for split-screen, multitasking, network handoff, and background transitions
Create user experience and data persistence tests for research history, session recovery, and file upload state
